overview: Heiress Hedda Nillson certain that her family is about to lose all its money, takes a job as a maid. After the usual trials and tribulations, Hedda falls in love with humble chauffeur Eric Landstrom.
tagline: A million-heiress who takes a fling at servant life- and a fancy to a chauffeur who loves motorboats and babies
title: Servants' Entrance
